summary: MY SERVICE SHIFT LIGHTS UP ON DASH AND ALL THE LIGHTS FOR P,R,N,D ALL LIGHT UP.  THIS NEEDS A RECALL I HAVE READ HUNDREDS OF ISSUES WITH THIS AND SOME ARE GETTING ATTORNEYS.  THIS NEEDS TO BE RECALLED MY JEEP ONLY HAS 48000 MILES.  AND IF I'M SERIOUSLY INJURED I'LL BE SUING ALSO.  YOU CAN'T LET THIS CONTINUE THESE DEALERSHIPS NEEDS TO HANDLE THIS AS A RECALL!
